title: 1896-97 Page Fence Ad Card NEW LOWER PRICE!

posts.post_title: 1896-97 Page Fence Ad Card NEW LOWER PRICE!
posts.post_content:
Recently, I was lucky enough to purchase a card that I have wanted for a long time. However, I now would like to sell the card, not because I want to, but I need to in order to purchase something else and have some money saved up.

Price is now the best offer over $5,000 by Friday November 4th at 9pm EST.



Thanks!
Travis
